overview: How much Petra-fied fun can you have in 60 minutes?  How about five incredible new music videos, exclusive on-the-road interviews with all five band members, and a first-hand look at the new Unseen Power World Concert Tour - complete with the most awesome Petra stage set-up ever? Backstage Pass is a one-of-a-kind video that, as a Petra fan, you must not miss!
title: Petra: Backstage Pass
